snippet.title: 1971 Project Helios - Gameplay Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/1971-project-helios-ps4/

In a frozen world, eight characters have to join forces for a common cause: find an important scientist kidnapped by a massive stratocracy. Along their way they will have to avoid raider attacks, investigate military headquarters, and infiltrate into the territory of a dangerous anti-technological religious sect.
